name: react-element-in-viewport
author: yunstv <yunsvt@163.com> (https://yunstv.github.io)
description: The React element visual area triggers the animation component

scripts.style: npm run sass && cssnano dist/ReactElementInViewport.css dist/ReactElementInViewport.min.css --no-zindex --no-reduceIdents && npm run style-injector
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:core && npm run pack-and-extract && npm run style
scripts.pack-and-extract: yarn pack -f react-element-in-viewport.tgz && npm run rm-pkg && npm run extract-pkg
scripts.extract-pkg: tar xzvf react-element-in-viewport.tgz -C node_modules/react-element-in-viewport --strip-components 1 && rimraf react-element-in-viewport.tgz
